item.title: Chef cookbook templating with cookiecutter
item.description: One of the challenges in chef cookbook development - create a comprehensive cookbook template. Good cookbook template might: standartize your cookbooks fill them with convenient predefinitions save your time. If you are not python averse, you could find that cookiecutter pretty useful tool for creating your cookbooks templates. This article describes my experience in creating chef cookbook template with cookiecutter. Cookiecutter in nutshell cookiecutter is a python based software.
